existing_features.title: Apply smooth transition animations to all buttons across the website with 'transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out' to eliminate instant or harsh movement
Add hover animations to all buttons with slight scale effect (scale: 1.05), smooth neon glow increase, background brightness transition, and soft responsive cursor interaction
Implement click interaction with subtle press effect that scales down to 0.96 on click and bounces back smoothly, preventing sudden jumps or lag
Optimize button motion quality using cubic-bezier or ease-out animation curves, enable GPU acceleration using only transform and opacity animations, and avoid layout shifting animations
Optimize button glow effects so neon glow smoothly fades in and out without flickering or sharp changes
Enable smooth scrolling across the entire website, implement smooth section transitions while navigating, and reduce animation jitter or frame drops
Optimize all button animations for 60fps performance, prevent heavy shadow or blur effects from causing lag, and ensure fast response on mobile devices
Ensure buttons on mobile respond instantly to touch with no delay after tap and maintain smooth animation timing

Add section entry animation to the Integrations section that fades in content smoothly with slight upward motion (translateY 30px to 0) over 0.6-0.8 seconds using smooth ease-out transition when the section enters viewport
Make integration cards or elements in the Integrations section appear sequentially with stagger animation delay of 0.1s between items and add soft scale-in effect from 0.95 to 1
Add hover interaction to integration cards that slightly lifts them upward, adds neon border glow on hover, creates smooth shadow expansion, and scales to 1.03 for premium feel
Add subtle floating motion to integration icons with very slow up-down animation loop and glow intensity that slightly pulses
Add soft animated gradient or moving neon light effect to the Integrations section background, keeping motion minimal and elegant
Ensure all Integrations section animations use only transform and opacity properties, avoid layout shifts, and maintain 60fps performance
Reduce animation intensity on mobile devices for the Integrations section while maintaining smooth appearance without lag

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve overall website smoothness with premium button animations and interactions
Enhance Seamless Integration section with modern smooth animations and visual engagement
